Collaborative Sketching

Use the sketch boxes below to complete the following steps:

1. Take 3 minutes to sketch one design solution idea. You can come up with a completely new idea or start with one of your existing ideas and add more details in your sketch.

2. Explain your sketch to your partner. How does the design solution work? What are it's special features and details?

3. Swap sketches. Add on to your partner's sketch. (1) Sketch some of the special features and details based on your partner's description and (2) add something new to their sketch.

4. Explain the additions you made to your partner. How does the design solution work? What are it's special features and details?

-----

Complete this exercise again with a different design solution idea.
